name: ChainStack
description:
Submission for the GMTK Jam 2021.
Theme is "Joined Together"

Use your hookshot to move platforms around in this puzzle platformer!

The inspiration was Sliding Puzzles and I thought it would be interesting to experiment with sliding and static platforms and explore the different gameplay dynamics.

Initally, the hookshot was supposed to be used to swing around as well, but the feature got dropped due to limited time. It would have been interesting to explore rail limited movement as well if I had more time. Might want to explore the idea again later if there's interest!

The amazing tileset comes from Kenney.nl with minor modifications from me.
